comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Elizabeth Carman was the 9-year-old daughter of Dr. and Mrs. Edwin Carman; Mrs. Carman was on trial for killing Lulu Bailey, and Elizabeth testifed at the inquest in the summer of 1914.

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: pennylrichardsca:  Thank you for identifying the daughter of Dr. and Mrs. Carman.  We will expand the title and add some details when we update the image description.
